SELECT ic.comment_level commentLevel, ic.content content, ic.sepc_name sepcName, ic.created_time createTime, u.face userFace, u.nickname nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id itemId, i.item_name itemName, i.sell_counts sellCounts, ii.url imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{paramsMap.keywords}, '%')
ORDER BY -- k:默认排序 -- c:根据销量排序 -- p:根据价格排序
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC
